description:
Lucas is Jamie's brother!
At 23, Lucas is four years older than his brother.
"It's like we're twins, though," he said. "We do everything together."
That's the truth!
How did Lucas feel about shooting his video at the same time as his brother?
"It's fun. It's interesting. We can bounce things off of each other."
"Are you two in competition to see who does a better job?" we asked.
"Oh, always!" he said.
title: Lucas
